alert.note: Alert for Randolph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:39PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Randolph County through 615 PM EDT... At 539 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Redkey to near Fountain City. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of Randolph County, including the following locations... Saratoga, Lynn, Union City and Ridgeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central Indiana.
